name: Crime Auto
description:
Welcome to Crime Auto! Gangster game with an open world in Los Angeles. Become grand mafia godfather. Theft cars, use tanks, fly a helicopter and rule the city! Don't be shy, nobody stops you. This world has no limits!

Crime Auto - mafia grand gangster features
- Free open world (TPS: third-person shooter)
- Over 40 vehicles to control
- More than 30 missions
- Special weapons
- Power-ups are really freak like jetpack or god-mode

Theft autos, tanks, and others military vehicles.
Explore a big LA city, find all hidden vehicles and special weapons. Complete mafia missions to become a real gangster or even godfather. Rule the city as you want. It's criminal paradise for everyone.

Really you have no limits.
You can fly a helicopter, shoot and destroy buildings, theft cars, control tanks, school bus or even jetpack. Decide when, where going and what to do. Who do you want to stay?
A thief, boss or godfather?

Most crazy and freak weapons:
- Golden Gun
- Machine gun
- Turret
- Rocket launcher

It's perfect crime game for fans of TPS action, auto racing, driving (tanks and cars), mafias and gangs.

The story:
You are one of the kids from street dreaming about power, money, supercars and women's. But you have no prospects for a better life. When you meet godfather Tommy, his right hand Frank, and Micheal, your life changes completely. You start to make tasks and missions that will help you advance in mafia ranks. Besides, you start earning huge amounts of money and attracting the attention of women. From theft to mafia grand gangster godfather.
The dream begins to come true.

Download and play: Crime Auto - mafia grand gangster
